title: 3DS-Recovery-Tool
update_notes: '<ul dir="auto">

  <li>Major changes with file handling. Cleaned it up so that it can properly access
  both archives. (i.e smdc and nand archives)</li>

  <li>Used more explicit names for options.</li>

  <li>Added option to restore LocalFriendCodeSeed_X and SecureInfo_X from backup.
  This option restores the backups you made within the app.</li>

  <li>Fixed dark theme mode being unreachable since the previous version (v1.2).</li>

  </ul>
